MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KA6 and KA7 postcode areas of Ayr. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:45pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:44 PM on Tuesday, 23 March 2021.
